text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...Haha. Well this is rare. Out of<n>everyone at training camp,
I'm the<n>first one up and about.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(As if... It's not like I planned to get up<n>early. I just couldn't
sleep.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I should run a little.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"I'm looking forward to seeing your<n>beautiful dance."
"She's so stunning,<n>her visuals are insane!" "Please post<n>
lots of pictures of your costume!"<n>Hm...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...I thought so. So that's why I was<n>chosen, huh...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...To be a pretty face?

text_block_list.name: Dance Teacher
text_block_list.text: Hmm... No, never mind. You're doing<n>great just as you are!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Really? Well, as long as it's pretty,<n>that's all that matters.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
And with that, I think I've done a<n>good job of playing my
role.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: What do you mean, your role?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Like, my part? I think I was chosen as<n>a mascot this time
around. My image<n>doesn't exactly shout "history" or<n>
"tradition" or anything, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
So I thought I'd do what I do best and<n>make sure this
festival goes viral. I'm<n>serious about the dance, though. I<n>
wanna surprise people with that.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Or at least, that's what I thought<n>would be cutest! ♪

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: AAAAAGH! Damn, I'm such a loser!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(I'm so over being judged by my<n>looks. But all I do is sulk
about it.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(Should I accept it, like Curren, and<n>just play out my role
properly? Is that<n>how I'll become my own person and<n>not
just a pretty face?)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(No, that can't be it. Curren is Curren.<n>What works for her
isn't gonna work<n>for me...)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... Huh?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Hup! Doo-doo-doo! Then like this!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yukino?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Oh, City! Good morn'n! Um,<n>were you doin' some
practice?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, well, something like that. What<n>about you? Practicing
the dance on<n>your own?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha... Yeah. I'm no good at danc'n<n>c'mpared to you two,
and I'm in the<n>middle for th'best part...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
So at the very least, I just don't want<n>to stand out for
th'wrong reason and<n>ruin it for you—oh my gosh!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, you okay? It's too early to be<n>pushing yourself this
much. Besides,<n>I've never once thought you would<n>ruin it
or anything like that.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ah... I know, let's go rinse off<n>together. I'm all sweaty too,
and the<n>day hasn't even started.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Wow! It's so thick and fluffy-wuffy, Ialmost can't believe this is my tail!What a treat, hav'n you wash my tail! Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I just have a few tricks up my sleeve<n>from experience,
that's all. The oil and<n>conditioner did the rest.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
The only reason those tricks worked<n>was because your tail
was already in<n>good condition. That goes for your<n>hair and
skin too.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and your dance, too. I think you<n>should believe in
yourself more,<n>Yukino!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: City... Hehe! Thank oodles.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
But still, it's an import'nt festival<n>p'formance. I've gotta
work harder<n>so I don't look like a chowderhead up<n>there!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I guess it is important...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Do you like festivals, Yukino?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Hm? Um... Yeah, I s'pose I do.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
We have an autumn fest'val in my<n>hometown too, to
celebrate the<n>harvest. It's real small c'mpared to<n>the
Fleetfoot Festival or the one we<n>went to yesterday, though.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
But it's still a roar'n good time! Food<n>stalls sell the freshly
picked veggies,<n>and we all eat, dance by the fire, and<n>sing
the rice-plant'n song together.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
When wint'r comes, ev'thing gets<n>covered in snow and it
goes quiet...<n>But when I think of the fun of the<n>festival, it
perks me right back up!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I see... So that's what festivals mean<n>to you.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Yeah... What do they mean to you,<n>City?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: What do they mean...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hey! So this is where you two were!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. You went for bath time without<n>me? That's so mean!
We're the<n>ceremonial dance trio!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ah?! Gee, I'm sorry! We didn't mean<n>to leave you out!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Apology not accepted! ☆ Ifyou're really sorry... Come to theoutdoor bath with me so we can allchat and bathe together! ☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: C'mon, c'mon! Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: (Curren is Curren. Yukino is Yukino...)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Then... what about me?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Um, President! Could I talk to you for<n>a minute please?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, Gold City. What is it?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You had some documents about the<n>Fleetfoot Festival,
right? Could I... see<n>them, please?
